meanings.definition: Extremely small or compact in size.
meanings.sent1: The ultracompact car easily fit into the tiny parking space.
meanings.sent2: The ultracompact camera was perfect for capturing quick moments on the go.
meanings.sent3: The ultracompact backpack held all his belongings, making him look like a walking turtle.
meanings.sent4: Her ultracompact phone was a miniature marvel of modern technology.
meanings.sent5: The ultracompact house was so small, it felt like living in a cozy shoebox.

meanings.definition: A device or object that is designed to be very small and portable.
meanings.sent1: He always carried an ultracompact flashlight in his pocket for emergencies.
meanings.sent2: The ultracompact speaker was easy to bring along to outdoor gatherings.
meanings.sent3: The ultracompact umbrella was comically small, barely covering his head in the rain.
meanings.sent4: Her ultracompact laptop was a powerhouse of productivity in a tiny package.
meanings.sent5: The ultracompact drone zipped through the air with impressive agility.
